name: NHSN_DEFINITION
description: This table holds information about National Healthcare Safety Network (NHSN) definition records. The records included in this table are Regulatory Group records that are designated as NHSN Location or NHSN Facility records.

columns.name: NHSN_DEF_ID_CMS_MU_NAME
columns.description: The name of the CMS Meaningful Use record.

columns.name: NHSN_DEF_NAME
columns.description: The name of the National Healthcare Safety Network (NHSN) definition record.
